message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I'm confident this is a fair reflection of its worth.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $1,300,000 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I believe the product is worth closer to my initial offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,350,000?
